tool.name: PrecursorMassCorrector
tool.description: Corrects the precursor entries of MS/MS spectra, by using MS1 information.
tool.command:
PrecursorMassCorrector
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_feature_in: -feature_in $param_feature_in #end if #if $param_precursor_mass_tolerance: -precursor_mass_tolerance $param_precursor_mass_tolerance #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_max_charge: -max_charge $adv_opts.param_max_charge #end if #if $adv_opts.param_intensity_threshold: -intensity_threshold $adv_opts.param_intensity_threshold #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_in
param.label: Input mzML file containing the spectra

param.name: param_feature_in
param.label:
Input featureXML file, containing features; if set, the MS/MS spectra precursor entries
will be matched to the feature m/z values if possible

param.name: param_precursor_mass_tolerance
param.label:
Maximal deviation in Th which is acceptable to be corrected;
this value should be set to the instruments selection window

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_max_charge
param.label: Maximal charge that should be assumed for precursor peaks

param.name: param_intensity_threshold
param.label: Intensity threshold value for isotope wavelet feature finder, please look at the documentation of the class for details

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Corrects the precursor entries of MS/MS spectra, by using MS1 information.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_PrecursorMassCorrector.html
